name: Coin Life
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 44:
Theme: Your Life is Currency

Yoinker is a Piggy Bank.  He's spent a long time building up the coins he carries, collecting them here and there, sometimes trading items he finds for a coin or two.  He lives a carefree, coin-filled life.  But then word spreads about a 'magical pig that will grant you riches' and heroes and townspeople from all over set out on the hunt and, unbeknownst to him, Yoinker is that pig!

He's now on the run, trying to escape the money-hungry townsfolk after him and the coins he carries.  Find a way to escape the area, and the rumor, before your health -or your coins- run out.
